title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.18 - Assignment of groundwater classifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.18 - Assignment of groundwater classifications

State Regulations
(a) The groundwater classifications defined
in sections 701.15 and
701.16
of this Part are assigned to
all the groundwaters of New York State. (b) The Class GSB shall not be assigned to
any groundwaters of the State, unless the commissioner finds that adjacent and
tributary groundwaters and the best usages thereof will not be impaired by such
classification. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
701.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
